paper_abstract: This paper presents the concept of the determination of the assembly sequence of machine parts and sets, utilising graph theory and heuristic methods of multicriterion optimisation. Algorithms for establishing the possible assembly sequences of machine parts and sets, on the basis of mathematical product model created with graph theory, as well as the selection of the most advantageous assembly sequence based on the Yager optimisation model are discussed. Also the algorithm of simulation and visualisation of the connection process using CAD systems and virtual environment (VE) are presented. This paper is an updated and revised version of the conference paper [1]. (C) 2012 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Computer aided determination of the assembly sequence of machine parts and sets
